body: The author is playing the long game with this one, the sister won't even see any action until about chap 30. The novel is NTR, but the author of the manhwa confirmed he wouldn't use the same ending. As an NTR fan, I still would like to see it play out though, hopefully they use the same developments, just a different end. In the latest chapters, it looks like the GF who isn't on the novel seems like the one that's going to be sacrificed, That's Just a guest though.
Stop with the damn huge breasts tag (this is like the 20 time), their tits are closer to an ironing board rathen then being actually huge
@NERDS but whole story gives you vanilla vibe how can you say this is NTR wtf
@NERDS wait so, the one who's doing the cuckolding to someone else is the MC? Then it's not Netorare, it's Netori lol we really need the Netori tag here fucking ASAP

Fuck the more I think about it the more pissed off I get. I was looking forward to seeing the Soldier's Sister blackmailed and forced into this relationship. Then I wanted the brother to find out in horror and lose his fuckn marbles. Would've been a masterpiece 🤌🏾

This shit was disappointing. I couldn't be bothered to read the dialogue, but I kept checking to see when the Soldiers Sister would be blackmailed into having sex by the Superior (whatever the fuck his title is).... but random females kept popping up ruining the story. Why make the story and title central to the Sister and then start inserting Characters and jumbling the plot. Fuckn annoying. At least focus on the Sister ffs.
This is why I ignore the Korean submissions regardless of tags
I remember this now...great art annoyingly shit plot....i just stopped
why is all the korean shit ntr and blackmail ffs.
